Package co.uk.niadel.mpi.modhandler.loadhandler

All of the relevant classes for loading the mods from the mods folder, and giving IModRegister classes their functionality.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IModContainer

    Class Description
    AnnotationHandlerNAPI
    The annotation handler used by N-API.
    Library  
    Mod
    What is handled in loading by NModloader to make code a bit smaller.
    NModLoader
    This isn't actually as flexible as FML, but it does most of the same stuff.

Package co.uk.niadel.mpi.modhandler.loadhandler Description

All of the relevant classes for loading the mods from the mods folder, and giving IModRegister classes their functionality. By far the most complex part of N-API.
Author:
Niadel
